title: Weekend Cat Sitter
description: Looking for a reliable cat sitter to take care of our playful tabby cat over the weekend.

title: Daily Check-ins
description: Seeking someone to do daily check-ins with our senior cat, providing food, water, and company.

title: Vacation Care
description: We're going on vacation and need a responsible person to feed our two cats and clean their litter boxes daily.

title: Long-Term Foster
description: Our family is relocating overseas and we need a loving foster home for our cat for the duration of our stay abroad.

title: Emergency Pet Sitter
description: Urgently need a pet sitter to look after our cat for a few days while we deal with a family emergency.
